MentoringProfile.name: MentoringProfile
MentoringProfile.description: Represents information for a participant in a mentoring program.

ContactId.description: The Contact associated with the Mentoring Profile.

IsMentee.description: Indicates whether the contact is a mentee (true) or not (false).

Name.description: The name of the Contact associated with the Mentoring Profile.

RelatedRecordId.description: The Program Enrollment or Provider Offering associated with the Mentoring Profile.

Summary.description: A summary of information associated with the contact.
